mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMM ( BC_IDX, BC_TITLE, BC_CONTENTS, BC_READHIT, BC_DEL_GB, BC_REG_DATE, BC_WRITER_NAME, BC_BCC_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOARD_COMM.NEXTVAL, #{BC_TITLE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BC_CONTENTS, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0, 'N', SYSDATE, 'Admin', #{BC_BCC_NAME, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT BC_IDX, BC_READHIT, BC_WRITER_NAME, BC_REG_DATE, BC_TITLE, BC_CONTENTS, BC_BCC_NAME FROM BOARD_COMM WHERE BC_IDX = #{BC_IDX, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_COMM SET BC_READHIT = NVL(BC_READHIT, 0) + 1 WHERE BC_IDX = #{BC_IDX}
UPDATE BOARD_COMM SET BC_TITLE = #{BC_TITLE}, BC_CONTENTS = #{BC_CONTENTS} WHERE BC_IDX = #{BC_IDX, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE BOARD_COMM SET BC_DEL_GB='Y' WHERE BC_IDX = #{BC_IDX}
